LanguageData.Atheism_AtheismConversionPowerDesc: Since atheists have no moral guide, their conversion power is multiplied by this amount to compensate.
LanguageData.Atheism_AtheismQuickTestDesc: Whether to use atheism as the starting ideo when selecting the Dev quicktest option in the main menu.
LanguageData.Atheism_IdeologicalVariationChance: Ideological variation chance in non-player factions: {0_percentage}
LanguageData.Atheism_DeityCountRangeDesc: The minimum and maximum number of deities non-atheist ideologies can have.
LanguageData.Atheism_IdeoLiberationProgressDesc: A faction is liberated from its ideology when all the ideology's deities are killed, or, if the ideology has no deities, all its relics and altars/ideograms are destroyed.
